channel.title: Getting-starteds on Advanced RecyclerView
channel.description: Recent content in Getting-starteds on Advanced RecyclerView

item.title: Getting started
item.description:
Installation

Add the following lines of code into your build.gradle.

dependencies {
    compile ('com.h6ah4i.android.widget.advrecyclerview:advrecyclerview:0.9.3@aar'){
        transitive=true
    }
}

NOTE: This library is served on jCenter. If the above gradle setting not getting work, try adding the following lines.

repositories {
    jcenter()
}
